report.title: Report for triggers against RISC surveys
report.description: Lists the most recent recordings for all species in the selected survey.
report.query: SELECT co.sample_id, co.survey_title, co.taxon, co.date_start, co.public_entered_sref, co.location_name, o.comment, co.website_id FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN occurrences o ON o.id = co.id WHERE (co.survey_id = 5 OR co.survey_id = 23) AND o.created_on > '#date#' AND co.record_status NOT IN ('I','T') #order_by#
